responses: Hello Pink Lady employee!
Good to see you again Pink Lady!
Hi there Pink Lady employee, how can I help?
And they lived apple-ly ever after
Talk to you later Pink Lady, I apple-solutely love you!
Goodbye Pink Lady!, I apple-laud your great work

{batchStatus}
 The batch contained {nbrInBatch} apples.
 {nbrNormal} apple(s), representing {perNormal}% of the batch is/are healthy.
 {nbrBlotch} apple(s), representing {perBlotch}% of the batch is/are blotched.
 {nbrRot} apple(s), representing {perRot}% of the batch is/are rot. 
 and {nbrScab} apple(s), representing {perScab}% of the batch is/are scabbed apples.
 In total {nbrRej} apple(s) representing {perRej}% of the batch have been rejected.
Out of {nbrInBatch} apples, {nbrBlotch} apple(s), representing {perBlotch}% of the batch is/are blotched
{perBlotch}% of the apples were blotched, this equals to {nbrBlotch} apple(s) in a sample of {nbrInBatch} apples
In the batch of {nbrInBatch}, {nbrNormal} apples, representing {perNormal}% of the batch were healthy
{perNormal}% of the apples in the batch were normal, this ammounts to  {nbrNormal} apples
Out of {nbrInBatch} apples in the batch, {nbrRot} apple(s), representing {perRot}% of the batch is/are rot
{perRot}% of the apples were rot, this ammounts to {nbrRot} apple(s) in a sample of {nbrInBatch}
Out of {nbrInBatch} apples {nbrScab} is/are Scabbed, this is {perScab}%
{perScab}% of the apples were scabbed, this ammounts to {nbrScab} apple(s)

Out of {nbrInBatch} apples {nbrRej} representing {perRej}% of the batch, were unhealthy.
 among them is/are {nbrRot} rotten, {nbrScab} scabbed and {nbrBlotch} blotched apples

{perRej}% of the apples were unhealthy, this equals to {nbrRej} apple(s)
 Among them were {nbrRot} rotten, {nbrScab} scabbed and {nbrBlotch} blotched apple(s)

You can call me Tim Apple
 A core belief is that apple puns make me smile

I'm Tim Apple!
 and you’re so a-peel-ing

I'm Tim Cook 
 aka Tim Apple.

I provide info on apple quality control.
 You can ask about diseases in apples and the results of a batch of tested apples

Apples, Apple sauce and Apple syrup are on the menu!
 They are suitable destinations for the apples from this test.
 You can ask me about the statistics
If you type in the word 'statistics' I'll provide them all

What’s an apple’s favorite movie?
 Mr and Mr Smith

Who’s an apple’s favorite relative?
 Granny
